name: postEcommerceStoresIdOrders
description: Add a new order to a store.

billing_address.description: The billing address for the order.

address1.description: The billing address for the order.
address1.title: Address Field 1

address2.description: An additional field for the billing address.
address2.title: Address Field 2

city.description: The city in the billing address.
city.title: City

company.description: The company associated with the billing address.
company.title: Company

country.description: The country in the billing address.
country.title: Country Code

country_code.description: The two-letter code for the country in the billing address.
country_code.title: Country Code

latitude.description: The latitude for the billing address location.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude for the billing address location.
longitude.title: Longitude

name.description: The name associated with the billing address.
name.title: Name

phone.description: The phone number for the billing address
phone.title: Phone Number

postal_code.description: The postal or zip code in the billing address.
postal_code.title: Postal Code

province.description: The state or normalized province in the billing address.
province.title: Province

province_code.description: The two-letter code for the province in the billing address.
province_code.title: Province Code

billing_address.title: Billing Address

campaign_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the campaign for an order.
campaign_id.title: Campaign ID

cancelled_at_foreign.description: The date and time the order was cancelled in ISO 8601 format. Note: passing a value for this parameter will cancel the order being created.
cancelled_at_foreign.title: Foreign Cancel Time

currency_code.description: The three-letter ISO 4217 code for the currency that the store accepts.
currency_code.title: Currency Code

customer.description: Information about a specific customer. For existing customers include only the `id` parameter in the `customer` object body.

address1.description: The mailing address of the customer.
address1.title: Address Field 1

address2.description: An additional field for the customer's mailing address.
address2.title: Address Field 2

city.description: The city the customer is located in.
city.title: City

country_code.description: The two-letter code for the customer's country.
country_code.title: Country Code

postal_code.description: The customer's postal or zip code.
postal_code.title: Postal Code

province.description: The customer's state name or normalized province.
province.title: Province

province_code.description: The two-letter code for the customer's province or state.
province_code.title: Province Code

id.description: A unique identifier for the customer. Limited to 50 characters.
id.title: Customer Foreign ID

opt_in_status.description: The customer's opt-in status. This value will never overwrite the opt-in status of a pre-existing Mailchimp list member, but will apply to list members that are added through the e-commerce API endpoints. Customers who don't opt in to your Mailchimp list [will be added as `Transactional` members](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#customers).
opt_in_status.title: Opt-in Status

customer.title: E-commerce Customer

discount_total.description: The total amount of the discounts to be applied to the price of the order.
discount_total.title: Discount Total

financial_status.description: The order status. Use this parameter to trigger [Order Notifications](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#order-notifications).
financial_status.title: Financial Status

fulfillment_status.description: The fulfillment status for the order. Use this parameter to trigger [Order Notifications](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#order-notifications).
fulfillment_status.title: Fulfillment Status

id.description: A unique identifier for the order.
id.title: Order Foreign ID

landing_site.description: The URL for the page where the buyer landed when entering the shop.
landing_site.title: Landing Site

lines.description: An array of the order's line items.

items.description: Information about a specific order line.

discount.description: The total discount amount applied to this line item.
discount.title: Discount

id.description: A unique identifier for the order line item.
id.title: Order Line Item Foreign ID

price.description: The price of an order line item.
price.title: Price

product_id.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the order line item.
product_id.title: Order Line Item Product Foreign ID

product_variant_id.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the order line item.
product_variant_id.title: Order Line Item Product Variant Foreign ID

quantity.description: The quantity of an order line item.
quantity.title: Quantity

items.title: E-commerce Order Line Item

lines.title: Order Line Items

outreach.description: The outreach associated with this order. For example, an email campaign or Facebook ad.

id.description: A unique identifier for the outreach. Can be an email campaign ID.
id.title: Outreach ID

outreach.title: Outreach

processed_at_foreign.description: The date and time the order was processed in ISO 8601 format.
processed_at_foreign.title: Foreign Processed Time

promos.description: The promo codes applied on the order

amount_discounted.description: The amount of discount applied on the total price. For example if the total cost was $100 and the customer paid $95.5, amount_discounted will be 4.5 For free shipping set amount_discounted to 0
amount_discounted.title: Amount Discounted

type.description: Type of discount. For free shipping set type to fixed
type.title: Type

promos.title: Promos

shipping_address.description: The shipping address for the order.

address1.description: The shipping address for the order.
address1.title: Address Field 1

address2.description: An additional field for the shipping address.
address2.title: Address Field 2

city.description: The city in the order's shipping address.
city.title: City

company.description: The company associated with the shipping address.
company.title: Company

country.description: The country in the shipping address.
country.title: Country Code

country_code.description: The two-letter code for the country in the shipping address.
country_code.title: Country Code

latitude.description: The latitude for the shipping address location.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude for the shipping address location.
longitude.title: Longitude

name.description: The name associated with an order's shipping address.
name.title: Name

phone.description: The phone number for the order's shipping address.
phone.title: Phone Number

postal_code.description: The postal or zip code in the shipping address.
postal_code.title: Postal Code

province.description: The state or normalized province in the order's shipping address.
province.title: Province

province_code.description: The two-letter code for the province or state in the shipping address.
province_code.title: Province Code

shipping_address.title: Shipping Address

shipping_total.description: The shipping total for the order.
shipping_total.title: Shipping Total

tax_total.description: The tax total for the order.
tax_total.title: Tax Total

tracking_carrier.description: The tracking carrier associated with the order.
tracking_carrier.title: Tracking carrier

tracking_code.description: The Mailchimp tracking code for the order. Uses the 'mc_tc' parameter in E-Commerce tracking URLs.
tracking_code.title: Tracking Code

tracking_number.description: The tracking number associated with the order.
tracking_number.title: Tracking number

tracking_url.description: The tracking URL associated with the order.
tracking_url.title: Tracking URL

updated_at_foreign.description: The date and time the order was updated in ISO 8601 format.
updated_at_foreign.title: Foreign Update Time

$ul: **_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**billing_address**: The billing address for the order.
**address1**: The billing address for the order.
**address2**: An additional field for the billing address.
**city**: The city in the billing address.
**company**: The company associated with the billing address.
**country**: The country in the billing address.
**country_code**: The two-letter code for the country in the billing address.
**latitude**: The latitude for the billing address location.
**longitude**: The longitude for the billing address location.
**name**: The name associated with an order's billing address.

**postal_code**: The postal or zip code in the billing address.
**province**: The state or normalized province in the billing address.
**province_code**: The two-letter code for the province or state in the billing address.
**campaign_id**: A string that uniquely identifies the campaign associated with an order.
**cancelled_at_foreign**: The date and time the order was cancelled in ISO 8601 format.
**currency_code**: The three-letter ISO 4217 code for the currency that the store accepts.
**customer**: Information about a specific customer.
**_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**address**: The customer's address.
**address1**: The mailing address of the customer.
**address2**: An additional field for the customer's mailing address.
**city**: The city the customer is located in.
**country**: The customer's country.
**country_code**: The two-letter code for the customer's country.
**postal_code**: The customer's postal or zip code.
**province**: The customer's state name or normalized province.
**province_code**: The two-letter code for the customer's province or state.
**company**: The customer's company.
**created_at**: The date and time the customer was created in ISO 8601 format.
**email_address**: The customer's email address.
**first_name**: The customer's first name.
**id**: A unique identifier for the customer.
**last_name**: The customer's last name.

**opt_in_status**: The customer's opt-in status. This value will never overwrite the opt-in status of a pre-existing Mailchimp list member, but will apply to list members that are added through the e-commerce API endpoints. Customers who don't opt in to your Mailchimp list [will be added as `Transactional` members](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#customers).
**orders_count**: The customer's total order count.
**total_spent**: The total amount the customer has spent.
**updated_at**: The date and time the customer was last updated in ISO 8601 format.
**discount_total**: The total amount of the discounts to be applied to the price of the order.
**financial_status**: The order status. Use this parameter to trigger [Order Notifications](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#order-notifications).
**fulfillment_status**: The fulfillment status for the order. Use this parameter to trigger [Order Notifications](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#order-notifications).
**id**: A unique identifier for the order.
**landing_site**: The URL for the page where the buyer landed when entering the shop.
**lines**: An array of the order's line items.
**order_total**: The order total associated with an order.
**order_url**: The URL for the order.
**outreach**: The outreach associated with this order. For example, an email campaign or Facebook ad.
**id**: A unique identifier for the outreach. Can be an email campaign ID.
**name**: The name for the outreach.
**published_time**: The date and time the Outreach was published in ISO 8601 format.
**type**: The type of the outreach.
**processed_at_foreign**: The date and time the order was processed in ISO 8601 format.
**promos**: The promo codes applied on the order
**shipping_address**: The shipping address for the order.
**address1**: The shipping address for the order.
**address2**: An additional field for the shipping address.
**city**: The city in the order's shipping address.
**company**: The company associated with an order's shipping address.
**country**: The country in the order's shipping address.
**country_code**: The two-letter code for the country in the shipping address.
**latitude**: The latitude for the shipping address location.
**longitude**: The longitude for the shipping address location.
**name**: The name associated with an order's shipping address.
**phone**: The phone number for the order's shipping address
**postal_code**: The postal or zip code in the order's shipping address.
**province**: The state or normalized province in the order's shipping address.
**province_code**: The two-letter code for the province or state the order's shipping address is located in.
**shipping_total**: The shipping total for the order.
**store_id**: The unique identifier for the store.
**tax_total**: The tax total associated with an order.
**tracking_carrier**: The tracking carrier associated with the order.
**tracking_code**: The Mailchimp tracking code for the order. Uses the 'mc_tc' parameter in E-Commerce tracking URLs.
**tracking_number**: The tracking number associated with the order.
**tracking_url**: The tracking URL associated with the order.
**updated_at_foreign**: The date and time the order was updated in ISO 8601 format.

$block: An error generated by the Mailchimp API. Conforms to IETF draft 'draft-nottingham-http-problem-06'.

$ul: **detail**: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. [Learn more about errors](/developer/guides/get-started-with-mailchimp-api-3/#Errors).
**instance**: A string that identifies this specific occurrence of the problem. Please provide this ID when contacting support.
**status**: The HTTP status code (RFC2616, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.
**title**: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It shouldn't change based on the occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
**type**: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type. When dereferenced, it should provide human-readable documentation for the problem type.
